# Holy Whisper (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Good Spells|good]]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** 30 ft.

**Area:** Cone-shaped burst

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates; see text

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 228

You whisper a single word in the primordial language of good that is anathema to the minions of evil and strengthens the resolve of good creatures. Evil creatures within the burst must make a Fortitude saving throw or become [[Sickened|sickened]] for 1 round/level. Evil outsiders with the evil subtype, evil-aligned dragons, and undead in the burst also take 2d8 points of damage if they fail their saves. Good-aligned creatures in the burst gain a +2 sacred bonus on attack and damage rolls for 1 round.
